name: WKInterfaceSlider
desc: An interface element that lets users select a single floating-point value from a range of values.

items.name: func setValue(Float)
items.desc: Changes the value of the slider.

items.name: func setColor(UIColor?)
items.desc: Sets the color of the slider bar.

items.name: func setNumberOfSteps(Int)
items.desc: Sets the number of steps for the slider.
